messages.subject: freecycle.org (was old electronics)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/13/05 1:24:54 PM, mummy124@bellsouth.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/13/05 1:24:54 PM, mummy124@... writes:

<< Search for freecycle instead of the dump. You offer free things from your

home and the one who wants it comes to pick it up. And yes they will take

all kinds of broken things. There is always someone able to fix them. You

can offer anything but meds. Even pets on some free cycle boards. It's to

help keep the dumps from filling up. >>

Cool, thanks!

I signed up and was going to offer a bed frame, but called the friend who
gave it to me years ago to give her first refusal, and she wants it back. <g>

Good deal, though! And I'll say "come and get my scanner" too.

Freecycle.org and they had groups listed in Germany too, and lots of places.

Sandra
